ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file to MongoDB - Insert data
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template reads a JSON file from a local fileshare and inserts its contents into a MongoDB collection.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_filename.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the JSON file, including the file name."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"mongodb://foo:bar@localhost:00000/?authSource=admin\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The connection string for accessing the MongoDB instance."},"Database":{"Value":"\"exampleDatabase\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the MongoDB database."},"Collection":{"Value":"\"exampleCollection\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the MongoDB collection where the file data will be inserted."}}
